message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a fantastic deal, considering its value to you. I'm confident this product will be a great asset for your business.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. $900,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $1,050,000?  This price still leaves room for a great profit for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. How about we meet in the middle at $975,000? I believe this is a fair price that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best price, but $975,000 is still too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $1,025,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to your business.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $1,025,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $990,000, but that's my final offer. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to my business.
